name: gencl
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: sylbi(w0, w1, wex(s0, wa(w2, wceq(c0, c1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wb(w0, wex(s0, wa(w2, wceq(c0, c1))))
-| wi(wex(s0, wa(w2, wceq(c0, c1))), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wb(w0, wex(s0, wa(w2, wceq(c0, c1))))
-| wi(wex(s0, wa(w2, wceq(c0, c1))), w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, wa(w2, wceq(c0, c1))), w1)
-| wi(wa(w2, wceq(c0, c1)), w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wb(w0, wex(s0, wa(w2, wceq(c0, c1))))
-| wi(wa(w2, wceq(c0, c1)), w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w2, wceq(c0, c1)), w1)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wi(w2, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wb(w0, wex(s0, wa(w2, wceq(c0, c1))))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wi(w2, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wi(w2, w1))
-| wi(w2, w3)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(w3, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wb(w0, wex(s0, wa(w2, wceq(c0, c1))))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wi(w2, w3)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(w3, w1))

comment: Implicit substitution for class with embedded variable. (Contributed by NM, 17-May-1996.)
